description: Spiced Apple Margarita is a&nbsp;tequila and apple juice based cocktail with a little bit of spice to give it that extra kick. It's not too sweet, but it has just enough sweetness to make you want another one after the first!
keywords: How To Spiced Apple Margarita Recipe
name: Spiced Apple Margarita
recipeIngredient: 1 ½ to 2 oz. Apple juice or cider

recipeInstructions.name: In a shaker with ice, add tequila, apple juice or cider, lime juice and honey simple syrup.
recipeInstructions.text: In a shaker with ice, add tequila, apple juice or cider, lime juice and honey simple syrup.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake vigorously for 30 seconds to combine ingredients evenly. Strain into a margarita glass filled with fresh ice cubes.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake vigorously for 30 seconds to combine ingredients evenly. Strain into a margarita glass filled with fresh ice cubes.
